amendment.description: To make conforming, minor, and technical changes in the bill as reported.

action.text: Amendment SA 889, previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 889 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 889 proposed by Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S7782-7783) To make conforming, minor, and technical changes in the bill as reported.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 889 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 889 proposed by Senator McCain.
